content: seduction - a slinky stylish silk scarflette by sara delaney materials 3 skeins berroco seduce colorway 4437 300yds 1 skein berroco seduce colorway 4448 100yds crochet hook size f/3 75mm scissors tapestry needle chain 38 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook * chain 1 skip 2 chain in next chain double_crochet 5 times chain 1 skip 2 chain and single_crochet in next chain repeat from * 3 more times turn row 2 chain 3 2 double_crochet in single_crochet chain 1 *skip 2 double_crochet and single_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 skip 2 double_crochet 5 double_crochet in next single_crochet ch1 repeat from * 2 more times skip 2 double_crochet and single_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 skip 2 double_crochet and 3 double_crochet in next single_crochet turn row 3 ch1 single_crochet in first double_crochet chain 1 *skip 2 double_crochet and 5 double_crochet in next single_crochet ch1 skip 2 double_crochet and single_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 repeat from * 3 more times single_crochet in last double_crochet turn repeat row 2 and 3 till yarn runs out or desired length ending with row 3 border is worked on 2 sides only one width and one length row 1 join border color at the end of the last row 3 completed turn chain 1 and work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet chain and double_crochet across to end in last single_crochet work 3 single_crochet this is your corner 3 work one single_crochet in each single_crochet and 2 single_crochet in each chain 3 space and double_crochet down the length of the scarf row 2 turn ch1 and single_crochet in each single_crochet back along the length of the scarf work 3 single_crochet in the center single_crochet of your corner 3 and continue working one single_crochet in each single_crochet along the width row 3 repeat row 2 remembering to work 3 single_crochet in the center single_crochet of your corner 3 row 4 ch4 this counts as one double_crochet chain 1 *skip 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet work one double_crochet chain 1 repeat from * to corner 3 in center single_crochet of corner 3 work double_crochet chain 1 3 times repeat from * to end fasten_off and weave in ends c sara delaney - chicken betty s pattern coop 2009 - chickenbetty@gmail com
